Enforces consistent spacing before function parenthesis (space-before-function-paren)

Rule Details

This rule extends the base eslint/space-before-function-paren rule. It adds support for generic type parameters on function calls.

How to use

{
  // note you must disable the base rule as it can report incorrect errors
  "space-before-function-paren": "off",
  "@typescript-eslint/space-before-function-paren": ["error"]
}

Options

See eslint/space-before-function-paren options.

Taken with ❤️ from ESLint core
